analyzed: gzhan du ni 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba sngon po dang / rtsibs rnams kyi shar dkar po dang / lho nag po dang / nub dmar po dang / byang ljang gu'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Others say that the center of this wheel is blue, the spokes are white in the east, black in the south, red in the west, and green in the north.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang glang po che'i steng du gnas pa dang / sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang nam mkha'i lding gi steng du gnas pa'o //

original: gzhung rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas 'dir ma bstan no//
analyzed: gzhung rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas 'dir ma bstan no//

analyzed: 'dus pa ni bla na med pa'i phyir ro //

original: de'i rjes la de ma thag tu 'dus pa'i dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug ni bde mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs su gsal bar bsgom par bya ste /

translated: The tathÄgatas summoned by the light rays of the heart should confer empowerment on those who have entered in that way.
